data.eml:eml: Monotypic no longer: a new species of Panca Evans (Lepidoptera: Hesperiidae: Hesperiinae: Moncini) from South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dolibaina, Diego Rodrigo, Carneiro, Eduardo, Mielke, Olaf Hermann Hendrik, Casagrande, Mirna Martins, Lamas, Gerardo (2017): Monotypic no longer: a new species of Panca Evans (Lepidoptera: Hesperiidae: Hesperiinae: Moncini) from South America. Zootaxa 4269 (1): 124-132, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4269.1.6
